## Biography {.left}

Andrew Martinez is an undergraduate student at Cal Poly San Luis Obispo, pursuing a career in Data Science. He has work experience on Marketing Analytics, Data Science, and AI/ML teams.

In his spare time you will find Andrew watching the Oakland Athletics or Sacramento Kings.
